
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18753583" title="发布于 2025-03-06 08:00">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">C#之 Dictionary 详解</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>基本概念</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code><span>Dictionary&lt;TKey, TValue&gt;</span></code><span>是C#中用于存储键值对集合的泛型类，属于<code><span>System.Collections.Generic</span></code><span>命名空间。它允许使用键（<code><span>Key</span></code><span>）来访问与其关联的值（<code><span>Value</span></code><span>）。其中，TKey表示字典中键的类型，TValue表示字典中值的类型。</span></span></span></span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Dictionary的基本结构</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>键（Key）：唯一标识集合中的一个元素。键是唯一的，不能有重复。</span></li>
<li><span>值（Value）：与键相关联的数据。值可以是任意类型，并且可以有重复。</span></li>
<li><span>键值对（KeyValuePair）：键和值的组合，表示Dictionary中的一个元素。</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Dictionary的主要特性</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>快速访问：通过键可以快速检索到对应的值，平均时间复杂度接近O(1)，因为<code><span>Dictionary&lt;TKey,TValue&gt;</span></code><span>类是作为哈希表实现。</span></span></li>
<li><span>唯一键（Key）：每个键在Dictionary中都是唯一的，不能重复。</span></li>
<li><span>动态大小：Dictionary的大小可以动态调整，当元素数量超过容量时，它会自动扩容。</span></li>
<li><span>无序集合：Dictionary中的元素是无序的，不能通过索引来访问它们。</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Dictionary的常用操作</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>以下是C#中Dictionary的常用操作完整代码，其中包括添加元素、访问元素、修改元素、删除元素、检查键或值是否存在，以及遍历元素：</span></p>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31a1O20FlOibZiagJianToTlVIYibfcx5yK21XgicwbMbclvPGGYyEMF7KUHo4YsurfQH2TqVrToMZOtls/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>public<span>&nbsp;<span>static<span>&nbsp;<span>void<span>&nbsp;<span>DictionaryOperation<span>(<span>)<span><br><span>{<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;//创建一个Dictionary来存储学生学号ID和姓名<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; Dictionary&lt;int<span>,&nbsp;string<span>&gt; studentDic =&nbsp;new<span>&nbsp;Dictionary&lt;int<span>,&nbsp;string<span>&gt;();<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span>#<span>region<span>&nbsp;添加元素<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;// Add方法（键必须唯一）<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; studentDic.Add(1<span>,&nbsp;"大姚"<span>);<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; studentDic.Add(2<span>,&nbsp;"小袁"<span>);<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; studentDic.Add(3<span>,&nbsp;"Edwin"<span>);<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;// 索引器语法（键不存在时添加，存在时更新）<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; studentDic[4<span>] =&nbsp;"Charlie"<span>;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; studentDic[5<span>] =&nbsp;"追逐时光者"<span>;<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;// 安全添加（避免异常）<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;bool<span>&nbsp;isAdded = studentDic.TryAdd(6<span>,&nbsp;"小明"<span>);&nbsp;// 返回 false，因键已存在<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span>#<span>endregion<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span>#<span>region<span>&nbsp;访问元素<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;// 直接访问（键必须存在，否则会有异常）<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;var<span>&nbsp;currentUserName = studentDic[1<span>];<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine(<span>$"当前学生姓名:&nbsp;<span>{currentUserName}<span>"<span>);<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;// 安全访问（避免异常）<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;if<span>&nbsp;(studentDic.TryGetValue(5<span>,&nbsp;outvar<span>&nbsp;getUserName))<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine(<span>$"UserName：<span>{getUserName}<span>"<span>);<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;else<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine("当前学生ID不存在"<span>);<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span>#<span>endregion<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span>#<span>region<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;// 修改元素<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; studentDic[2<span>] =&nbsp;"大西瓜"<span>;<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine(<span>$"修改后的名称：<span>{studentDic[<span>2<span>]}<span>"<span>);<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span>#<span>endregion<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span>#<span>region<span>&nbsp;删除元素<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;// 删除元素<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;bool<span>&nbsp;isRemoved = studentDic.Remove(3<span>);<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine(<span>$"删除结果：<span>{isRemoved}<span>"<span>);<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span>#<span>endregion<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span>#<span>region<span>&nbsp;检查键或值是否存在<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;// 检查键是否存在<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;if<span>&nbsp;(studentDic.ContainsKey(1<span>))<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine("存在"<span>);<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;else<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine("不存在"<span>);<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;bool<span>&nbsp;isExistcontainsValue = studentDic.ContainsValue("追逐时光者"<span>);<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine(<span>$"是否存在：<span>{isExistcontainsValue}<span>"<span>);<span><br><span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span>#<span>endregion<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span>#<span>region<span>&nbsp;遍历元素<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;// 遍历元素<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;foreach<span>&nbsp;(KeyValuePair&lt;int<span>,&nbsp;string<span>&gt; student&nbsp;in<span>&nbsp;studentDic)<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine(<span>$"ID:&nbsp;<span>{student.Key}<span>, Name:&nbsp;<span>{student.Value}<span>"<span>);<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;// 使用键的枚举器<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;foreach<span>&nbsp;(var<span>&nbsp;key&nbsp;in<span>&nbsp;studentDic.Keys)<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine(<span>$"Key:&nbsp;<span>{key}<span>, Value:&nbsp;<span>{studentDic[key]}<span>"<span>);<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;// 使用值的枚举器<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;foreach<span>&nbsp;(varvaluein<span>&nbsp;studentDic.Values)<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;// 注意：这种方式不能直接获取键，只能获取值<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine(<span>$"Value:&nbsp;<span>{<span>value<span>}<span>"<span>);<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span>#<span>endregion<span><br><span>}<span><br><span><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>参考文章</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>https://learn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/dotnet/api/system.collections.generic.dictionary-2?view=net-9.0</span></li>
</ul>
</div>
